results.title: The Effect of Metformin Treatment on Disease Control in Patients with Acromegaly.
results.journal: Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were divided into three groups after @<m>DISEASE_Pituitary_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010900 @@@pituitary adenectomy@@@ as those who received somatostatin receptor ligand and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (group A), somatostatin receptor ligand treatment only (group B), and those who received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment only (group C).

citations.NLM: Sahin HR, Sahin S, Sarac B, Sulu C, Kadioglu P, Ozkaya HM. The Effect of Metformin Treatment on Disease Control in Patients with Acromegaly. Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets. 2024;24(6):709-716. PMID: 38379171
citations.BibTeX: @article{38379171, title={The Effect of Metformin Treatment on Disease Control in Patients with Acromegaly.}, author={Sahin HR and Sahin S and Sarac B and Sulu C and Kadioglu P and Ozkaya HM}, journal={Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets}, volume={24}, number={6}, pages={709-716}}

results.title: Pituitary gigantism presenting with depressive mood disorder and diabetic ketoacidosis in an Asian adolescent.
results.text_hl: He was then administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, 500 mg twice daily, and to date, his serum glycohemoglobin has been <7%.

citations.NLM: Kuo SF, Chuang WY, Ng S, Chen CH, Chang CN, Chou CH, Weng WC, Yeh CH, Lin JD. Pituitary gigantism presenting with depressive mood disorder and diabetic ketoacidosis in an Asian adolescent. J Pediatr Endocrinol Metab. 2013;26(9-10):945-8. PMID: 23729615
